name: Obedience (Bulb)
description:
Obedience is a video game made for LD43.
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/obedience

The theme was : "Sacrifices must be made"
It's a horror and creepy point and click.

Credits :
- Graphic design & illustration : Sephora Schmidt
More illustrations here : https://www.instagram.com/sephora_sch/
UI UX design portfolio : www.sephoras.net

- Unity dev : p0nse
- Sound design : Ace17
